title: Delightfully welcome Krishna on your tongue | Soulful Japa
speaker: HH Stoka Krishna Maharaj

segments.key_quote: So in the same way, the Holy name is the Supreme Personality of Godhead.
segments.summary: The speaker explains that chanting the Holy Name is like welcoming the Supreme Personality of Godhead as a VIP, emphasizing the importance of delight, relishing association, and enthusiastic service.
